column6: It was just over thirty years ago that the Hulk fought a sawed-off, scrappy Canadian named Wolverine.  And on the island where nothing is as it seems, he's returned--exactly as he was back then--to try and carve himself a piece of the Hulk.  With an ending that you absolutely cannot miss!
column8: | writer:Peter David | colorist:Edgar Delgado | inker:Tom Palmer | penciller (cover):Lee Weeks
